terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to Interdomestik Asistenca. These terms govern your membership.

sections.membership: Membership is valid for 1 year from the date of purchase. It includes access to our protection network and discount mediation.
sections.services: We provide claim handling assistance, legal consultation, and damage assessment.
sections.fees: Membership fees are non-refundable after the 30-day guarantee period. Success fees apply only upon successful claim recovery.
